General.Name: Escar Turizm Tasimacilik Ticaret AS
General.Description: Escar Filo Kiralama Hizmetleri A.S. provides motor vehicle renting services in Turkey. The company offers various services, including roadside assistance, car rental insurances, consulting service, tire management, spare vehicle, door to door Service, and online fleet reporting. Escar Filo Kiralama Hizmetleri A.S. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Papirus Plaza Merkez Mah., Istanbul, Turkey, 34406
